businessProfile.name: Vourla Mediterranean Grill & Cafe
businessProfile.address: 1860 Tamiami Trl N, Naples, FL 34102, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 1860 Tamiami Trl N, Naples, FL 34102, USA

reviews.text:
If you‚Äôre looking for the best Gyro in Naples, Vourla is absolutely the place to go. We ordered the Gyro with French fries, and it was hands down the best we‚Äôve had in the city,  the meat was perfectly seasoned, tender, and juicy, and the pita was fresh and soft. The fries were crispy and hot, making the combo unbeatable.
The value is incredible too, only $10 for a generous portion, which is rare to find these days. Service was outstanding: super friendly staff who were quick to prepare our order and made us feel welcome even though we ordered take‚Äëout.
They also have indoor seating available, so you can choose to dine in if you want to enjoy the atmosphere.
We loved it so much that we‚Äôre hoping they expand and open a location in Miami,  this kind of quality and price would be a hit there. If you‚Äôre in Naples and craving authentic Gyros with great service and value, don‚Äôt miss this spot.

Well I came here many years ago and was excited to return but had a pretty bad experience this time. Lentil soup and pudding was excellent but I tried the chicken shish kebab and it was overcooked, had a rubber taste to it and I was unable to eat it. The waitress was nice and accommodating but it was not a nice feeling leaving the restaurant almost paying $85 and eating just the soup and pudding dessert after ordering two entrees along with them‚Ä¶ Partially my fault because I did not enjoy the lamb entree due to the smell of lamb meat in general but was I hoping I would enjoy the chicken more which I did not. Just a bad experience overall but the service and ambience was nice besides that.

This place is absolutely incredible! The food and service were outstanding. Our waiter Murat was friendly, helpful and made us feel welcome.  It's hard finding authentic turkish cuisine, but this place really hit the nail on the head. Tried a good amount of their dishes on the menu, and I can't recommend them enough! Each dish is better than the next.  If you are looking for quality and hearty meals, you have to visit Vourla. Top recommendations: turkish wedding soup, sultan's delight, Shepard's salad, and adana kebab.

Our first time here & Hazal was so friendly & welcoming at the front . We had Murat as our server & he was amazing!! He helped us choose some delicious dishes!! Everything was fresh, hot & flavorful we will be back!! The entree dishes were so beautiful too!! I tried Turkish coffee for the first time & it was so good‚ù§Ô∏è
Grills are great service is excellent. Chicken soup is decent, appetizer are good. Hazal is great thanks for the service.

recentReviews.text: T√ºrkiyedeki lezzeti aratmadƒ± ger√ßekten lezzetli yemekler

This is best middle eastern place we‚Äôve been to in SWFL. The mixed meat platter we had was super flavorful! And I can tell their Kunafe is made fresh in house. It‚Äôs the best kunafe my husband and I have had in this area! Their service is very good, too. Definitely recommend this place to anyone who loves Mediterranean food.

July 21, 2025 - As a party of four this time, we shared stuffed grape leaves and zucchini fritters for appetizers.  For entrees, the Grilled Vegetables were savory-flavorful; and the Oven-Baked Meatballs, while smaller than anticipated, were nonetheless excellent, filling, and presented bubbling in a cast-iron serving bowl.

The Moussaka was tasteful, but was served and flavored differently than the traditional [Greek] lasagna-like layered casserole. This Turkish version is better described as a stew served in a large shallow bowl.   See comparison photos.

Our server, Murat, again provided exceptional service. When it started to rain as we leaving, another Vourla staffer was waiting at the door with an umbrella which he held for the ladies while getting into the car  Nice touch.  See first review below.
===============================
July 7, 2025 An easy review - FIVE stars. This evening was the first time the three of us had been to Vourla, and we'll definitely be back again. For appetizers, we shared Stuffed Grape Leaves, Char-Grilled Octopus, and Zucchini Fitters. All were spot-on. Our entrees were the Hand Chopped Adana Kebab, Grilled Vegetables, and Lamb Chops. Again, all were extremely satisfying, with the savory aromatic tastes characteristic of Turkish flavor profiles. A special thanks to Murat, who graciously helped us decide on our selections and who served the attractive presentations and Chianti. We highly recommend Vourla for delicious Mediterranean cuisine.
Grills are great service is excellent. Chicken soup is decent, appetizer are good. Hazal is great thanks for the service.

I ordered the mall special to go to see if I wanted to come back for the sit down dining experience. I discovered that they had jipped me on the meat and put a whole lot of rice under it. Also the meat was not properly seasoned so it tasted kind of gamey.

It‚Äôs the best kunafe my husband and I have had in this area! Their service is very good, too. Definitely recommend this place to anyone who loves Mediterranean food.

detailedReviews.author: Maximilian
detailedReviews.text: Great service and food!

detailedReviews.author: A K
detailedReviews.text: Grills are great service is excellent. Chicken soup is decent, appetizer are good. Hazal is great thanks for the service.

detailedReviews.author: filius dracul
detailedReviews.text: I ordered the mall special to go to see if I wanted to come back for the sit down dining experience. I discovered that they had jipped me on the meat and put a whole lot of rice under it. Also the meat was not properly seasoned so it tasted kind of gamey.

detailedReviews.author: Robbie
detailedReviews.text:
If you‚Äôre looking for the best Gyro in Naples, Vourla is absolutely the place to go. We ordered the Gyro with French fries, and it was hands down the best we‚Äôve had in the city,  the meat was perfectly seasoned, tender, and juicy, and the pita was fresh and soft. The fries were crispy and hot, making the combo unbeatable.
The value is incredible too, only $10 for a generous portion, which is rare to find these days. Service was outstanding: super friendly staff who were quick to prepare our order and made us feel welcome even though we ordered take‚Äëout.
They also have indoor seating available, so you can choose to dine in if you want to enjoy the atmosphere.
We loved it so much that we‚Äôre hoping they expand and open a location in Miami,  this kind of quality and price would be a hit there. If you‚Äôre in Naples and craving authentic Gyros with great service and value, don‚Äôt miss this spot.

detailedReviews.author: BLAL BLAL
detailedReviews.text: 2 stars for food, but the guy there is very rude, this is the 1st and last time to go there, never met him before, however, he treated me like a beggar when I ask him for anything, he was very upset with me once i entered there, and throw the food on the table like if I'm eating there for free, never seen such attitude before

detailedReviews.author: Michelle Jones
detailedReviews.text: Very friendly attentive  staff and great food and there is also a mall take out special

detailedReviews.author: Mo Gaibee
detailedReviews.text: I went to Vourla last night as my trip was coming to an end. Looks great from the outside and ample parking. Muraat who was waiting on me provided a truly impeccable service. Food was amazing and so fresh. I had the wings for started which were amazing and brought promptly. Adana Kebab with the rice and salad was amazing. I also had the Baklava for dessert which really hit the spot. I would definitely recommend and is great spot if looking for amazing Halal food in Naples, Florida. I‚Äôll definitely be back again one day.

detailedReviews.author: ƒ∞lker Bey
detailedReviews.text: Florida nƒ±n batƒ± taraflarafƒ±ndaki en kaliteli ve butik restoran.√ßalƒ±≈üanlar g√ºler y√ºzl√º  i≈ülerini severek yapƒ±yorlar.Her ≈üey i√ßin √ßok te≈üekk√ºrler...üôè

detailedReviews.author: Sharon Gallo
detailedReviews.text: Very clean, great atmosphere! Food was outstanding, and for being with a party of 10, all our food , lamb chops, kabobs were served fresh and hot, all at the same time. Definitely recommend and a must try the Turkish coffee the best!

detailedReviews.author: Julia W
detailedReviews.text: Foods are great. Service was wonderful

detailedReviews.author: Javier Diaz Rodriguez
detailedReviews.text: Excellent Turkish restaurant, excellent food, super attentive and fast service, 100% recommended

detailedReviews.author: Latifa KT
detailedReviews.text: Newyork to Naples definitely recommend this place. Everything we order were delicious.

detailedReviews.author: david lenio
detailedReviews.text: Great food,  super nice people, definitely going back

detailedReviews.author: Oleksandr S
detailedReviews.text: there are little/no customers, so they served you food made few days ago

detailedReviews.author: Siham Taji
detailedReviews.text:
The food wasn‚Äôt great not testy but no horrible
I really didn‚Äôt like it

detailedReviews.author: buse nur ceyhan
detailedReviews.text: This place is absolutely incredible! The food and service were outstanding. Our waiter Murat was friendly, helpful and made us feel welcome.  It's hard finding authentic turkish cuisine, but this place really hit the nail on the head. Tried a good amount of their dishes on the menu, and I can't recommend them enough! Each dish is better than the next.  If you are looking for quality and hearty meals, you have to visit Vourla. Top recommendations: turkish wedding soup, sultan's delight, Shepard's salad, and adana kebab.

detailedReviews.author: Mel DSouza
detailedReviews.text: We ordered Adana Kebab, Shrimp Casserole and Kunefe. Everything was good. My only issue is they charged 20% gratuity and did not mention/disclose. They again ask for extra tip 18% onwards. I added 18% without realizing they had already added 20% gratuity. I quickly reversed the extra 18%.(Imagine 38% tip). Kindly inform customers that you are adding 20% gratuity. Thanks.

detailedReviews.author: Gregory Tortoriello
detailedReviews.text: Great food, excellent  service  will be back.

detailedReviews.author: Hakki Eker
detailedReviews.text: We came here one time but we were disappointed in the quality of the doner. It tastes like the meat from yesterday and it is terrible. shame on them

detailedReviews.author: Nadia P√©rez
detailedReviews.text: Great food and service. My family was very pleased with the experience.

detailedReviews.author: Robert Prasch
detailedReviews.text: I ordered this food on doordash and it was still phenomenal when it got to me. The gyro chicken was delicious, the rice and salad were the same. The hummus was the second best I've ever had. The baklava was lacking, but I bet it was great when it was first baked. I appreciate this place and the good foods they provide.

detailedReviews.author: Myra Darwish
detailedReviews.text: There were nine of us who dined at Vourla‚Äôs; we were all impressed with Hazal, our server who excelled at welcoming and guiding us. We tried many appetizers, there was plenty pita bread served liberally, all were delicious. Our entrees were excellent, and the desserts delicious. We will be back again to this special place.

detailedReviews.author: Abel Cepeda
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic food and the service was awesome. We had several dishes. The Octopus was perfect and so were the other plates. Enjoy

detailedReviews.author: murat geziyor
detailedReviews.text: Kebaplar T√ºrkiye'yi aratmƒ±yor üëç

detailedReviews.author: Silvia Valli
detailedReviews.text: Their octopus leg cooked in boiling butter in a skillet is to die for, sooo good. Their meat, lamb especially, was amazing too. I wish more people tried Turkish cuisine cause they are really missing out:) very friendly service too

detailedReviews.author: D. A.
detailedReviews.text: War super!

detailedReviews.author: Rose Z.
detailedReviews.text:
Although this restaurant is far from where we live, we enjoy visiting this place as the food, service and staff are great -
Eating becomes a wonderful dining experience.  Lunch is great value as well.  This is the best place for Turkish food and the best place to have kanafe dessert!
Try it and you'll agree for sure!

detailedReviews.author: Paul C
detailedReviews.text: Delicious and heathy Mediterranean/turkish food. Always a great staff. Food is consistently excellent. Definitely recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Mezzy Mefford
detailedReviews.text: Highly recommend this beautiful restaurant! ‚ù§Ô∏è My mother and I went there for the first time last night and not only was is it delicious, but it's a beautiful atmosphere! Also my waiter was very handsome and kind üòÉ

detailedReviews.author: Issy
detailedReviews.text: Well I came here many years ago and was excited to return but had a pretty bad experience this time. Lentil soup and pudding was excellent but I tried the chicken shish kebab and it was overcooked, had a rubber taste to it and I was unable to eat it. The waitress was nice and accommodating but it was not a nice feeling leaving the restaurant almost paying $85 and eating just the soup and pudding dessert after ordering two entrees along with them‚Ä¶ Partially my fault because I did not enjoy the lamb entree due to the smell of lamb meat in general but was I hoping I would enjoy the chicken more which I did not. Just a bad experience overall but the service and ambience was nice besides that.

detailedReviews.author: Kayvan yamini
detailedReviews.text:
In one word, they know their job
Everything was perfect
Food
Service
Details
Taste
Highly recommended

detailedReviews.author: James (Lomyril)
detailedReviews.text: I had the lunch special lamb and beef Doner. The atmosphere was great, the service was good, and I enjoyed the food.

detailedReviews.author: Sarah C
detailedReviews.text: I ordered the manti and it was absolutely delicious‚Äîclearly handmade. The flavor was authentic. The atmosphere was also fantastic, really welcoming. Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Jennifer Foglia
detailedReviews.text: Our first time here & Hazal was so friendly & welcoming at the front . We had Murat as our server & he was amazing!! He helped us choose some delicious dishes!! Everything was fresh, hot & flavorful we will be back!! The entree dishes were so beautiful too!! I tried Turkish coffee for the first time & it was so good‚ù§Ô∏è

detailedReviews.author: Yevhen Kriukov
detailedReviews.text: Awesome and tasty food. Delicious lamb kebab! Nice shisha selection.

detailedReviews.author: Susie Takla
detailedReviews.text: Excellent food!! I ordered the chicken shish kebob, was delicious!  Also, got the falafel appetizer which was also delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Firas Barghouthi
detailedReviews.text: Excellent experience, great food, and tea.

detailedReviews.author: Tareq Khader
detailedReviews.text: I just had lunch at Vourla the, meat is to die for, so juicy and delicious and quality is excellent. Service is great. It‚Äôs truly a taste of Istanbul

detailedReviews.author: Lazaro Cruz cintra
detailedReviews.text: Muy buen. Lugar . Una comida exquisita

detailedReviews.author: Brian T
detailedReviews.text: First time here, was a very good experience. The food was exceptional and service was great. I will definitely be back again. Got the lamb shish kabob and the moussaka.

detailedReviews.author: Jacqueline Roque De Escobar
detailedReviews.text: Great atmosphere!  Excellent food & service, highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Heather Bladich
detailedReviews.text:
Love this restaurant!  The food is always fresh and perfectly done.  Fresh mint in the lemonade, yummy appetizers like stuffed grape leaves and this amazing tzatziki that‚Äôs made with saut√©ed carrot. Lots of warm pita bread.
I love the chicken shish kebabs, and they also have perfect lamb chops.

detailedReviews.author: Austin White
detailedReviews.text: Great Turkish coffee!

detailedReviews.author: Sinem
detailedReviews.text: Every food we tried here was absolutely delicious! Highly recommend the Adana Kebab and Lamp Shish. And the service was great, our server Mert was very friendly. Thank you guys!

detailedReviews.author: Dan Jubea
detailedReviews.text:
Pretty great overall, I thought the lamb kabob and lamb chops were a bit bland. With some extra salt they were very good still.

Very nice staff too - gave us a complimentary appetizer and chocolate strawberries!

detailedReviews.author: Lynn
detailedReviews.text: Love this place been there a couple times, but this waiter made my friens real uncomfortable. Otherwise, we will be back !

detailedReviews.author: Steven Taracevicz
detailedReviews.text: Outstanding lamb, dishes, and service. Very modestly priced.

detailedReviews.author: dayron gonzalez
detailedReviews.text: It was a fantastic experience. I recently returned from a trip to Istanbul, the food there was food at Vourla, is very similar. It was colorful, well presented and very tasty. There were seven of all, and all the plates were amazing, from appetizers and pita bread to desserts kunefe, baklava.... and the entrees we all great as well. Every now and then a different server who passed by our table would ask about the food and if we were enjoying. Extremely friendly all. Our server, Gokman, was more than welcoming and helpful.

detailedReviews.author: Tony Rey
detailedReviews.text: Excellent food and service. They are so kind. The food gets better each time we go. We love eating there.

detailedReviews.author: Mairene Yumar
detailedReviews.text:
Era mi dia de cumplea√±os y andabamos buscando algo diferente,nos gusta probar comida de diferentes culturas,esta fue una excelente opcion,el ambiente muy agradable,los meseros,muy atentos y nos explicaron las opciones que podr√≠an gustarnos,escogimos un Kebad de Cordero.
Uff superxcelente,suavidad,sabor,no tengo palabras,lo repetir√≠a, el Te Turco me encanto! Los dulces que prob√© y un aperitivo de Zanahoria molida con Pan pita,superespecial! 100 % recomendado!

detailedReviews.author: Eugene Tsirlin
detailedReviews.text: Our family took us here as they have been here before and they liked so they suggested we go. They were 100% correct! Between 5 appetizers and 3 main courses, more than enough food for 4 people and everything was excellent. Efficient service and modern Turkish ambiance.

detailedReviews.author: Nour Lawrence
detailedReviews.text: My last order to go had tabouleh with other items the tabouleh was slimy and disgusting it made me through all my order in the trash.

detailedReviews.author: Sena Kizilkan
detailedReviews.text: Wir hatten es in den Ferien so vermisst etwas T√ºrkisches zu essen. Als wir das Restaurant entdeckt hatten, haben wir uns sehr gefreut. Vourla hat unsere Erwartungen  √ºbertroffen. Das Essen war sehr fein. Auch die Bedienung war zuvorkommend. Danke euch!

detailedReviews.author: William
detailedReviews.text: Excellent food and service

detailedReviews.author: ADƒ∞L SEFA AKG√úL (chef's)
detailedReviews.text:
Arkada≈ülar eƒüer T√ºrk usul√º kebap yemek isterseniz Naples‚Äôin en iyisi.
Arkada≈üƒ±mƒ±n da y√ºz ifadesinden g√∂rd√ºƒü√ºn√ºz √ºzre Her ≈üey gayet g√ºzel eƒüer buraya ugrarsan Karƒ±≈üƒ±k ƒ±zgara tabagi yanƒ±na da iki duble T√ºrk rakƒ±sƒ± i√ßmeden sakƒ±n gitme

detailedReviews.author: Dmitriy Prok
detailedReviews.text: I arrived a bit early for my take out and they sat me down at the bar and gave me a complimentary Turkish tea to enjoy while I waited. Classy.

detailedReviews.author: Blanca Sommerfield
detailedReviews.text: I went to this restaurant and it was such a disappointment, I order a salad and asked if they could add falafel to my salad. The salad was bland and old lettuce was used. I don‚Äôt like to complain so I ate it, when we asked for the check I was furious they charge me 15.99 for the salad and 10.99 for falafel. So my bad salad only cost me 26 dollars. My husband asked and I they had to say was we can look into it next time you come!!!! Outrageous!!!

detailedReviews.author: Dulce Maria Hernandez
detailedReviews.text: Agradable lugar

detailedReviews.author: Nikita Makarov
detailedReviews.text: I would highly recommend a Sultan delight, this is very authentic and delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Jamie Jeffrey
detailedReviews.text:
Love this place and the people who work there. Food and atmosphere everything is perfect!
Update is still wonderful !  Some of my favorite people have been left, but great new employees have joined.

detailedReviews.author: SamiraPlayz
detailedReviews.text: My family and I went there the day after New Year‚Äôs and it was absolutely impeccable. The atmosphere was amazing, the servers were so friendly and interactive, and the food was to die for. The experience was very special to us and we will definitely dine there again!

detailedReviews.author: Sandro Dossantos
detailedReviews.text:
What a disappointment;
very expensive for the quality of the food and the atmosphere, the falaf rice was simply boiled rice with some pieces of carrot and some peas, the octopus came cut into slices, 6 thin slices; not to say that it was a disaster, the lamb was not bad.

detailedReviews.author: Yunior Tamayo
detailedReviews.text: Super nice waiter. Fancy place. Really good food ü•ò.

detailedReviews.author: Yanet Leon
detailedReviews.text: Vourla is my favorite place in Naples, their food is amazing and their waiters are always friendly and welcoming. Just love the atmosphere there. Highly recommended.

detailedReviews.author: Yuliet Leon
detailedReviews.text: My favorite restaurant in town. The waiters are amazing!!

detailedReviews.author: Priscilla Mullvain
detailedReviews.text: Went for Christmas lunch, everything over cooked, ordered salmon, very overcooked and dry, will never visit again.

detailedReviews.author: Dick Nicholson
detailedReviews.text: Good Turkish restaurant. Lots of choices, well prepared food and liked the atmosphere.

detailedReviews.author: P I (soley lavi)
detailedReviews.text: Food was great. Service was okay. Atmosphere was very nice and very romantic. I am giving 3 because the servers need more attention to details and also because the restaurant charged us for a refill of tea without warning. I did not mind paying but since it is an uncommon thing to charge for a refill of ice tea, they should have told us upfront.

detailedReviews.author: Renee Lee
detailedReviews.text: Incredible food and great service!

detailedReviews.author: Andy Cohen
detailedReviews.text: What a find.  Delicious. Get the kneffeh!

detailedReviews.author: Motahhareh
detailedReviews.text: What kind of a halal restaurant serves alcohol, it‚Äôs ridiculous

detailedReviews.author: Partem Voice
detailedReviews.text: Very very very yam!!! Good Job!!!

detailedReviews.author: Giuliana Fretes
detailedReviews.text: Best Turkish food in ALL Naples, amazing Kunefe and Baklava. You should try them.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.4/5 rating from 100 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers rave about the authentic and flavorful Turkish and Mediterranean cuisine, highlighting dishes like the Adana Kebab, Gyro, and Kunafe as standout options. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The exceptional and attentive service, often personalized by staff members like Murat, enhances the dining experience and leaves a lasting impression on guests. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The restaurant offers great value for money, with generous portions and quality meals at reasonable prices, making it a favorite among diners. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews about rude staff and poor customer service experiences - review management can address this concern
Complaints about food quality, such as bland or improperly cooked dishes - social media marketing can improve this area
Unclear pricing and unexpected charges, such as undisclosed gratuity and charges for refills - Boostly marketing services can improve this
